rows.label: qev025114_MSG0001
rows.name: What's that Ackwar creep's problem, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025114_MSG0002
rows.name:
Gerome finally gets serious about things,
and then that shrimp comes and messes it up![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025114_MSG0003
rows.name:
Next time he comes around asking questions,
I'm gonna pound him good![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025114_MSG0005
rows.name:
This time of day, he's probably eating over in
Deliverance Park.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025114_MSG0006
rows.name:
But after how you and Ackwar messed with him,
he's gonna be piiiiiissed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025114_MSG0007
rows.name:
If you plan on asking any more questions,
get ready for him to answer with his fists. Pa-pow![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025114_MSG0008
rows.name:
Hey, I heard a loud boom from the residential district.
You know what that was about?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025114_MSG0009
rows.name: Those xenos finally go all terrorist on us?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025114_MSG0010
rows.name:
Yeah, well, I think Gerome was headed that way.
Hope he didn't get caught up in anything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025114_MSG0011
rows.name:
Gerome said he was just leaving to go eat,
but he's still not back...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025114_MSG0012
rows.name:
Probably tore up his gut on junk food again.
I bet he's praying to the ol' porcelain god as we speak![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025114_MSG0013
rows.name:
Poor guy was finally getting back on track, too.
Whatever the deal is, I hope it doesn't last long.[ST:wait ]
